scripts.dev: concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd" "cd client && bun run dev" "cd server && bun run dev" --names="client,server" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.build: bun run build:client && bun run build:server
scripts.install: bun run install:client && bun run install:server
scripts.clean: bun run clean:deps && bun run clean:dist
scripts.lint: bun run lint:client && bun run lint:server
